body.name: Big and Tall 400lbs Office Chair - Adjustable Lumbar Support Quiet Rubber Wheels Heavy Duty Metal Base, High Back Large Executive Computer Desk, Thick Padded Ergonomic Design for Back Pain (Black)
features: 🔸【𝐁𝐢𝐠 𝐀𝐧𝐝 𝐓𝐚𝐥𝐥 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐅𝐨𝐫 𝐄𝐱𝐭𝐫𝐚 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭】This big office chair is designed to accommodate the needs of larger individuals and provide them with all the comfort they need. It is a high office chair with a generously-sized, breathable seat cushion with elastic spring pack , and adjustable height and rock back and forth function that enable easy customization for both big and tall users

🔸【𝐋𝐮𝐦𝐛𝐚𝐫 𝐒𝐮𝐩𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭 𝐏𝐫𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐧𝐭𝐬 𝐁𝐚𝐜𝐤 𝐏𝐚𝐢𝐧】Tired of standard desk chairs that make you hunch and cause you muscle tension, discomfort, and back pains? This ergonomic office chair features adjustable built-in lumbar support that helps align your spine and allows you to easily adjust the sitting positions so that you can be productive and feel comfortable all day

🔸【𝐏𝐫𝐨𝐭𝐞𝐜𝐭 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐅𝐥𝐨𝐨𝐫𝐬 𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐜𝐡𝐞𝐬】Tired of swivel chairs that scratch your floors? Unlike many desk chairs, our swivel desk chair features rubber chair wheels that ensure smooth and quiet gliding. They are made of soft, nylon rubber with a polyurethane outer, and don’t leave marks on your hardwood, laminate, tile, or vinyl flooring. No need to use a mat under your high computer chair anymore

🔸【𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐯𝐲 𝐃𝐮𝐭𝐲 𝐎𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐞 𝐂𝐡𝐚𝐢𝐫 𝐖𝐢𝐥𝐥 𝐋𝐚𝐬𝐭 𝐀 𝐋𝐢𝐟𝐞𝐭𝐢𝐦𝐞】If you are looking for a durable executive office chair, work chair, office desk chair, or gaming seat, you are in the right place. The high desk chair boasts a heavy-duty swivel metal base, class-4 gas cylinder, strong rubber wheels for easy maneuverability, and a great weight capacity tested to support users up to 400 lbs

🔸【𝐖𝐨𝐫𝐤, 𝐒𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐝𝐲 𝐎𝐫 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐲 𝐈𝐧 𝐌𝐚𝐱 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭】Need a comfortable desk chair for the office or an ergonomic gaming chair for home? Our home office chair is exactly what you need. It is made of soft, breathable bonded leather that prevents sweating, with a padded headrest for extra comfort, preventing the pain and discomfort that comes from being locked into the same position for too long

🔸【𝐑𝐢𝐬𝐤-𝐟𝐫𝐞𝐞 𝐏𝐮𝐫𝐜𝐡𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐎𝐟 𝐘𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐎𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫 】Your satisfaction matters and this is why we make sure that each chair is flawlessly made just for you. We are certain that you will love our big & tall chair but if for any reason you are not completely satisfied, our helpful, prompt and friendly Customer Service specialists are at your disposal. Besides, our products are also backed by a 1 year warranty so if anything goes wrong, just let us know
body.description: Why Choose Our Heavy Duty Chair? Here Are The Top 3 Reasons! GREAT OFFICE CHAIR FOR BIG & TALL: This wide seat office chair takes comfortable sitting to a whole new level. It has a weight capacity of a full 400lbs, features a strong chair base for max stability, and is easy to move around with the smooth-rolling wheels. LUMBAR SUPPORT ENCOURAGES A HEALTHY POSTURE: Our office ergonomic chair has a shape that allows your hips to open, your knees to drop, your arms to relax, and your spine to rest in its natural curve. MUST-HAVE DESK CHAIR FOR ADULTS, TEENS: Whether you need a strong desk chair for large people or a gaming chair for heavy people, this heavy duty computer chair is your go-to option.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Do Not Buy A Big Tall Desk Chair Before You Read This! Looking for a modern, comfortable, heavy duty chair with back support? Introducing An Elite Black Computer Chair By Yorick! Now Yorick has released an ergonomic computer chair for executives, office workers, and avid gamers.

Why Choose Our Heavy Duty Chair? Here Are The Top 3 Reasons! GREAT OFFICE CHAIR FOR BIG & TALL: This wide seat office chair takes comfortable sitting to a whole new level. It has a weight capacity of a full 400lbs, features a strong chair base for max stability, and is easy to move around with the smooth-rolling wheels. LUMBAR SUPPORT ENCOURAGES A HEALTHY POSTURE: Our office ergonomic chair has a shape that allows your hips to open, your knees to drop, your arms to relax, and your spine to rest in its natural curve. MUST-HAVE DESK CHAIR FOR ADULTS, TEENS: Whether you need a strong desk chair for large people or a gaming chair for heavy people, this heavy duty computer chair is your go-to option. Seat Length: 23 inches Seat Depth: 22 inches Capacity: 400lbs Breathble Bonded Leather Fantastic Rubber Wheels Heavy Duty Metal Base

Rocking Back and Forth Rocking back and forth between 90° to 110° degrees, you can also adjust the flexibility of rocking back in your chair Built-in Lumbar Support Adjuster The back support adjuster will help you adjust the pressure on your back at your preferable lever Durable Rubber Wheels Top standard chair wheels ensure quiet and easy gliding. They are safe for most types of floors and take the fuss out of using a mat under your office chair Heavy Duty Metal Base Sturdy heavy metal basecan provide impeccable stability and strength, this big and tall office chair bears a max weight of 400lbs

Breathable Bonded Leather Thick padded back support and back cushion, made of premium breathable bonded leather and high density memory foam, all of these provide you with ultimate comfort. This computer chair is not only durable, soft, and comfortable, but also super-easy to care for. Wipe it clean with a damp cloth to remove stains, dust, or dirt, and enjoy it vibrant like brand new for years.

Need More Reasons? Using the rubber castors for those with hardwood floors, you’ll love the satisfyingly smooth feel as you glide Rocking back and forth between 90 and 110 degrees but also adjust the rocking pressure Comfy Office Chair – Breathable Bonded Leather Cushion Easy Assembly Office Chairs Ergonomic - Simple Manual Included What You Get: 1 * Big Tall Office Chair 400lbs 1 * Instructions Manual Do Not Hesitate!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unrivaled Comfort and Service
reviews.reviewText: The Yorick Big & Tall High Headrest Executive Chair is a pinnacle of comfort and design. With its ergonomic features, including a supportive high headrest and adjustable lumbar support, it redefines the executive seating experience. Wheels glide along effortlessly every use. The chair's sleek aesthetics seamlessly blend with any professional setting.The plush upholstery, coupled with the generously padded armrests, invites you to indulge in a seating experience that transcends the ordinary. The chair's swivel and tilt mechanism, executed flawlessly, provides a full range of motion, allowing you to effortlessly navigate your workspace.What truly sets this purchase apart is the exceptional service provided by Yorick. Swiftly addressing a minor issue, they showcased a commitment to customer satisfaction that's rare in today's market. The combination of unparalleled comfort and outstanding service makes this executive chair a wise investment for both style and support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is perfect, its so comfy and cushioned. Gives my back the perfect support. Easy to roll around in. Assembly was way easier then expected. I love how it accommodates all sizes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Chair for a big guy
reviews.reviewText: I'm happy with the chair. It's super comfy and the poly wheels are a nice touch that has it roll super smooth.Width is good for a husky fella like myself. Cushion is great. I enjoy the slight recline of the chair back in it's normal position, but I did see that some don't like this so much.I'm also just tall enough (or long legged enough) that my legs don't have an issue with the depth of the seat. I did see that some others found this to be problematic. Case in point is my female companion, her legs didn't touch the floor, but the seat is big enough that she can sit cross-legged as she enjoys.My only slight annoyance is that I think the chair could be slightly lower but that's personal preference. I'm the guy in the office that drops the chairs in the conference room to the lowest position. An inch or two drop in the hydraulic to lower the seat might also help with the point above with the deeper seat.It was also super easy to put together as long as you know to loosen the arm bolts as you're putting the back in place, otherwise you're going to suffer some difficulty like is mentioned in the other reviews.Overall, I'm really happy with the chair. Caveat: I've only had the chair and been using it for 2 months so I have no clue how it will hold up, but it's rock solid and good materials.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy office chair for tall people without back issues
reviews.reviewText: This is a sturdy office chair, and I don't see this chair falling apart anytime soon. It has a good frame and the faux leather seems to hold up from scratches and tears well. My husband put this together but never complained about it being hard to do so, I am 5ft 7in and overweight for my height but not above 400lbs and I have no doubt this chair can hold me just fine. I have this chair on the lowest setting for height. If I had it adjusted any higher my feet wouldn't touch the ground especially due to the length of the seat of this chair. Once sitting I do have to kind of wiggle back into it to fully get my back to touch the back of the chair as it should. It does look very nice and is nicely padded especially compared to my old office chair. As for the Ergonomic Design for Back Pain this chair fails in that regard. It is adjustable as they say but it does nothing to support my back except feel like a big lump in the lower back area of the chair. The chair only leans back and rocks. This chair doesn't recline at all and the arms aren't adjustable. The sciatica I have has actually worsened in the short time I got this chair and my back has been hurting worse than usual (I ordered it Dec. 6, 2023). I would have to say this is a heavy-duty chair that could be comfortable if you lean back alot while working on the computer (possibly a gamer?). I don't lean back and like to sit up straight as I do lots of typing. I'm thinking I may return this chair but haven't attempted to do so yet. I dread having to take it apart and box it up for shipping as it's quite heavy.
